snippet: Over the past two weeks, Palestinians have taken to the streets in the West Bank to protest the policies of Salam Fayyad, the prime minister of the Palestinian Authority.
abstract: Palestinians take to the street in the West Bank to protest the policies of Palestinian Authority Prime Min Salam Fayyad, in a sign that the Authority's popularity is waning amid rising prices and increased taxes.
lead_paragraph: Over the past two weeks, Palestinians have taken to the streets in the West Bank to protest the policies of Salam Fayyad, the prime minister of the Palestinian Authority.

headline.main: Support for Palestinian Authority Erodes as Prices and Taxes Rise
headline.print_headline: Support for the Palestinian Authority Is Eroding as Prices and Taxes Increase
